comments.text:
+Teddy B. K, Magic fan. More specifically, Abzan user. I think your deck is 
overpowered. But just because Abzan is Op, that doesn't make you a bad 
person. And what about me? Just because I have a pony as a profile pic, 
that doesn't mean I'm a bad person. In fact, I'm not even a brony anymore. 
My friends just recognize my account for that photo. So quit responding to 
people based on their profile pictures unless you have the full story. And 
btw, if you still play Abzan, buy an Ajani Mentor of Heroes Planeswalker. 
$20, plus one/plus one counters every turn on 3 creatures, and 100 life 
after 4 turns.

comments.text:

accurate documentary, the arctic penguins are extinct. Polar bears wiped

himself is something of a mystery. My money's on there being some rather 
distressed seals about 150,000 years ago.

comments.author: Willy Massey

comments.text:
Never been Penguins on the Northpole.
The ones on the southpole are only there for 1-2 months to protect the eggs.
They are mostly in water, on small islands near the south pole and on 
floating pieces of ice.
What they showed in the video must have happened the day before mating 
season on the southpole.
